question_text: Which of the following are valid use cases for a mobile device management system? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Force encryption on all managed devices
Block camera access during work hours
Push operating system updates across all devices
correct_answer: Force encryption on all managed devices
Block camera access during work hours
Push operating system updates across all devices
explanation: MDMs can enforce security settings, manage features like the camera, deploy email configs, and control OS updates across a device fleet.
